name: Hampton Inn & Suites Clovis - Airport North

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Fresno area does not have a lot of great places to stay. This is the nicest we've found. The room was quiet & spacious (we had the mini-suite with a couch) and the bed was comfortable. Air conditioner worked great - which is important for Valley in the summer. A nice bathroom with a very nice shower (good water pressure). Minor complaint - no shampoo provided, I think they consider the shower gel to be both a body wash and shampoo. My husband enjoyed the daily breakfast. We will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm a diamond level member of Hilton's program and travel a lot for work. Of all the Hilton brands, the Hampton line is by far the most consistent and probably the best value for the money spent. This is, as long as you have a car. Don't expect a lot of walkable options.
reviews.title: Great start for Yosemite visit

reviews.text: We stayed at this particular Hampton Inn on the way to a weekend getaway at Yosemite. Clovis is on the side of Fresno area closest to the park, so the location is pretty good. It is still a good two hours to get to the center of Yosemite Valley.
reviews.title: New Hotel as of July 2009 !!!

reviews.text: I was upgraded to a larger room, or "suite" which was spacious and had a little wet bar with fridge and microwave. Also enjoyed the flat screen tv and the bed was very comfortable. Other nice highlights of Hampton in general are the comp wi-fi and I especially like the computer "breakfast-in-bed" tray which rocks when I'm traveling for work. The breakfast lived up too the normal Hampton Inn quality and the coffee pretty good.
reviews.title: New and clean with free breakfast, just a couple problems
Brand New and Clean!
reviews.text: Excellent value for money and a good location if you're en route to Yosemite. Close enough by driving to many restaurant options and major roadways. Staff very friendly and welcoming!
